Job Title: Investment Solutions Consultant, FILI - Covington, KY

Location: Covington, KY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
2092901

Job Description

Investment Solutions Consultant, FILI

Serving as an Insurance and Annuity subject matter expert and product specialist, the Investments Solutions Consultant personally supports assigned branch & phone representatives who are working to achieve insurance sales goals through the generation of new business and the development of existing customer relationships.

The Expertise We’re Looking For

Series 7, 63 & 65/66 and State Insurance license(s) requiredA complete understanding of Fidelity's guidance tools and how our insurance products can be positioned within these toolsTen or more years of financial service sales with a proven track recordBachelor’s Degree required; advanced degree or certification preferredComfortable with moderate travel, up to 25%


The Purpose of Your Role

Fidelity Investments Life Insurance Company (FILI) was formed to meet the critical retirement needs of Fidelity customers. FILI is a critical component of Fidelity's accumulation and retirement platform, offering innovative products that are low cost, transparent and easy to buy.

The FILI Investment Solutions Consultant plays an integral role in helping representatives develop, strengthen and retain client relationships, and supports retirement planning (accumulation, income and wealth transfer planning) with FILI products. To do so appropriately, the ISC-FILI must have full competency in all Fidelity Investments' products and services, a complete understanding of the Planning and Guidance Tools, and a working knowledge of Consultative Selling Skills (CSS).

The Skills You Bring

Your expert-level of Consultative Selling SkillsYou have a strong service orientation to ensure the needs of the supported territory are being metYou have impeccable personal interaction skills, including communication, influence, facilitation, & public speakingYou are an effective coach and motivator, as well as a consummate team player 


The Value You Deliver

Your market knowledge is critical in aiding in the development of potential business opportunities within a representative's Book of Business, your partnership is instrumental in determining appropriate next steps to pursue and develop their businessPartnering with Management and Regional Planning Consultants to develop and execute a business plan to achieve insurance sales goalsEnsuring a consistent approach and execution of business strategies by partnering with the field FILI RVPs in the assigned territoriesProviding educational support by participating in team meetings, one-on-one coaching sessions, leading informal and formal training sessions; Your training ensures representatives are well versed in insurance products and understand their place within the financial planning processCommunicating sales techniques & practices specific to financial planning strategies for accumulation and distribution, new products and service updates and competitor offeringsParticipate and/or present in team meetings, hold scheduled and unscheduled 1:1 meetings and lead/support informal and formal training sessions 


How Your Work Impacts The Organization

You are developing a high level of trust and credibility with all Branch and Phone business partners through outstanding interactions, superior responsiveness and unfailing follow-through.

Certifications

Series 07 - FINRA, Series 66 - FINRA

Company Overview

Fidelity Investments is a privately held company with a mission to strengthen the financial well-being of our clients. We help people invest and plan for their future. We assist companies and non-profit organizations in delivering benefits to their employees. And we provide institutions and independent advisors with investment and technology solutions to help invest their own clients’ money.

Join Us

At Fidelity, you’ll find endless opportunities to build a meaningful career that positively impacts peoples’ lives, including yours. You can take advantage of flexible benefits that support you through every stage of your career, empowering you to thrive at work and at home. Honored with a Glassdoor Employees’ Choice Award, we have been recognized by our employees as a top 10 Best Place to Work in 2024. And you don’t need a finance background to succeed at Fidelity—we offer a range of opportunities for learning so you can build the career you’ve always imagined.

Fidelity's working model blends the best of working offsite with maximizing time together in person to meet associate and business needs. Currently, most hybrid roles require associates to work onsite all business days of one assigned week per four-week period (beginning in September 2024, the requirement will be two full assigned weeks).

At Fidelity, we value honesty, integrity, and the safety of our associates and customers within a heavily regulated industry. Certain roles may require candidates to go through a preliminary credit check during the screening process. Candidates who are presented with a Fidelity offer will need to go through a background investigation, detailed in this document, and may be asked to provide additional documentation as requested. This investigation includes but is not limited to a criminal, civil litigations and regulatory review, employment, education, and credit review (role dependent). These investigations will account for 7 years or more of history, depending on the role. Where permitted by federal or state law, Fidelity will also conduct a pre-employment drug screen, which will review for the following substances: Amphetamines, THC (marijuana), cocaine, opiates, phencyclidine.

We invite you to Find Your Fidelity at fidelitycareers.com.

Fidelity Investments is an equal opportunity employer. We believe that the most effective way to attract, develop and retain a diverse workforce is to build an enduring culture of inclusion and belonging.

Fidelity will reasonably accommodate applicants with disabilities who need adjustments to participate in the application or interview process. To initiate a request for an accommodation, contact the HR Accommodation Team by sending an email to accommodations@fmr.com, or by calling 800-835-5099, prompt 2, option 3.

Experience Level (if available): None
